ygData.subject: Quest Question
ygData.msgSnippet: I know I can t use a bow. That said, I am trying to assemble the Trueshot Bow.  I need Treant Shards. Jyle Windshot in the Inn in Freeport will give them to me
ygData.messageBody:
I know I can't use a bow.

That said, I am trying to assemble the Trueshot Bow. I need Treant Shards.
Jyle Windshot in the Inn in Freeport will give them to me in exchange for a
Faydark Champions Tunic (and two gp...). I cannot find the tunic. No
woodelf ranger that I have talked to has even heard of the tunic. And
before they shut my server down today, you could not find it in Faydark
Champions in the wood elf city.

Does anybody know where I can find Treant Shards (in the wild...) OR knows
where I can find the above mentioned tunic.

Thanks in Advance
Mark Mazurik
